title: Hour 2 - Peter King (04-27-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Peter King (04-27-20)
description:
Peter King gives his opinion of how the virtual draft went overall. Peter thinks the NFL will keep some aspects of the virtual draft going forward with future drafts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
